Concepts predict discontinuities in phenomenal trajectory

Last updated on April 30, 2021

If continuous experience is a trajectory in phenomenal space, and if often mental representations are called forth to enable phenomenal representations, without external influences, and if categorical perception and concepts are a thing, then trying to imagine a gradient of experience should be met with a series of discontinuities.
